programme.title: Home Town

programme.title: Home Town
programme.desc: A couple wants a vacation home that's big enough to entertain but manageable to maintain. After showing them a 1920s cottage and a 1912 Craftsman, Ben and Erin create the perfect getaway for them with a large chef's kitchen.

programme.title: Home Town
programme.desc: A Georgia couple loves the outdoors as much as they love Laurel, and they're in need of a home with a big kitchen and lots of yard space for entertaining. Ben and Erin are determined to bring this couple's outdoorsy ways into the design of their home.

programme.title: Home Town
programme.desc: A woman moving back to Laurel after being away for years wants a place big enough to accommodate her parents, kids and grandkids if they visit all at once. Erin can't wait to deliver on her ideal design plan: blue and white in the French provincial style.

programme.title: Home Town: Takeover
programme.desc: Check out this sneak peek as Ben and Erin begin revitalizing a small town by turning a foster couple's home into a welcoming space for kids, and Dave and Jenny Marrs join in to help them tackle a boutique on the brink of closure.

programme.title: Home Town
programme.desc: A couple is looking for a house where they can entertain friends in a walkable neighborhood. Ben and Erin give their pick a complete facelift by adding a coastal color scheme, built-in banquet and a back patio that's perfect for entertaining.

programme.desc: A New Orleans couple is looking for a vacation home in Laurel to be closer to her mom, and their ideal house needs space for hosting crawfish boils. Ben and Erin transform a dated home into a modern oasis complete with two kitchens and a spectacular pool.

programme.title: Rehab Addict: Rescue
programme.desc: Nicole Curtis converts an empty attic space into a new bathroom for a mother-daughter duo who have been sharing a bathroom in their historic Detroit home.

programme.title: Rehab Addict: Rescue
programme.desc: Nicole Curtis swoops in to rescue an engaged couple who find themselves in over their heads while they try to repair their water-damaged Craftsman home and plan their wedding at the same time.

programme.title: Rehab Addict: Rescue
programme.desc: Musician Curtis Roach and his mother call on Nicole Curtis to show them the rehab ropes after they step in to save his grandmother's dilapidated duplex from demolition.

programme.title: Rehab Addict: Rescue
programme.desc: A man, his girlfriend and his grandma love sharing a home in historic Detroit, but the couple would like to have a living space of their own. Nicole steps in to convert the third floor into a suite while giving Grandma a surprise renovation of her own.

programme.title: Rehab Addict: Rescue
programme.desc: Nicole helps a newly engaged couple modernize and restore functionality to their outdated, 1970s-inspired kitchen and bathroom. To stay under budget, Nicole teaches them the meaning of sweat equity as they chip in to help the team cross the finish line.

programme.title: Rehab Addict: Rescue
programme.desc: A couple sends an SOS after they find themselves dealing with the unexpected growing pains of their adult children suddenly moving back to an unready nest. Nicole Curtis answers their call by helping them transform their attic space into a bedroom suite.

programme.title: Property Brothers: Forever Home
programme.desc: A Las Vegas couple is following their dream of giving foster children the type of safe, loving environment that they had growing up. Drew and Jonathan rework the main floor to give the home a safety update and a warm vibe for future kids in years to come.

programme.title: Property Brothers: Forever Home
programme.desc: A couple's home used to be the entertainment hub for their friends, but the addition of their daughter makes it feel like a children's play palace. Drew and Jonathan rework the space to create a home that's perfect for entertaining and raising a family.

programme.title: Property Brothers: Forever Home
programme.desc: After downsizing to a modest home so they could afford to foster children and raise their own, a couple's house is in desperate need of an overhaul. The brothers tackle the kitchen, living room, family room and laundry room.

programme.title: Property Brothers: Forever Home
programme.desc: A couple bought their home when their daughter was born and the couple before them lived there for 40 years. With the recent arrival of another baby, they're learning that the closed-off layout and lack of storage isn't working for their growing family.

programme.title: Property Brothers: Forever Home
programme.desc: Drew and Jonathan overhaul a couple's main floor and create a functional house with more storage and space for their sporty sons to hang out.

programme.title: Property Brothers: Forever Home
programme.desc: Nicole's grandfather built their home in the 1950's and it's been passed down in her family from generation to generation. The home is rich with history and Nicole and her husband are thrilled to be able to raise their kids in the home she grew up in.

programme.title: Property Brothers: Forever Home
programme.desc: When Troy and Susan found out they were having a third child, they bought a new house in the Las Vegas suburbs for them to grow into. The brothers help them with the main floors' awkward layout.

programme.title: Property Brothers: Forever Home
programme.desc: Bruce and Patricia adopted their niece and nephew after Bruce's brother passed away. Their home is no longer working for the new family of five. Drew and Jonathan rework the entire main floor and back deck to help the family stay in the home they love.

programme.desc: Robert follows in Steve's steps wrangling Utah, a highly venomous 12-foot king cobra. Dr. Amber visits Tandora to care for wild Koalas. Back at the Zoo, an old injury flares up for Bruce the Brolga, a bird who's been in the Irwin's care for 26 years.

programme.title: Melissa & Joey
programme.desc: Mel discovers Dani is something of a musical prodigy and gets her a piano to foster Dani's dreams. But she's caught off guard to find Joe opposed to it, until she uncovers his secret musical past in a boy band.

programme.title: Melissa & Joey
programme.desc: Joe, wanting the family to spend time with each other, puts a ban on cell phones and computers all weekend long. But it may come back to haunt him when he's offered a job.

programme.title: Melissa & Joey
programme.desc: Mel deals with Lennox's infatuation with her professor while Joe deals with Dani's irresponsible behaviour.

programme.title: Melissa & Joey
programme.desc: Lennox wants to follow her professor to Colombia. Joe makes Dani reach out to her mom to tell her about her irresponsible behaviour.

programme.title: The 700 Club
programme.desc: A magazine program featuring current events as seen from a Christian perspective, as well as testimonies of changed lives.

programme.title: 700 Club Interactive
programme.desc: Teaching Biblical principles and tackling a variety of topics. Social media is used to minister directly to its audience and encourages viewers to ask questions and send in prayer requests.

programme.title: The Middle
programme.desc: After attending year-end school parent-teacher conferences, Frankie and Mike are shocked to discover that Brick may be held back from going to the third grade because the school librarian, Mrs. Nethercott has it out for him due to 31 unreturned books.

programme.title: Cruel Summer
programme.desc: Taking place over 3 summers in the 90s when a popular teen goes missing, and a seemingly unrelated girl transforms from a sweet and awkward outlier to the most popular girl in town, eventually becoming the most despised person in America.

programme.title: Alien III
programme.desc: Ripley has brought an unwelcome visitor to a foreign planet whose inhabitants have no advanced technology or modern weapons to fight back with when Ripley's alien goes on the attack.

programme.title: Alien: Resurrection
programme.desc: An unholy combination of human and alien genetics is discovered, made possible by an uneasy alliance between a renegade band of smugglers and a zealous group of scientists.

programme.title: Alien
programme.desc: The crew of the spaceship Nostromo investigates a signal from a nearby planet, where they discover thousands of strange eggs. What they initially thought was an SOS turns out to be a warning prompting them to leave, but an alien has boarded the ship.

programme.title: Aliens
programme.desc: Officer Ellen Ripley is the sole survivor of the spaceship Nostromo's encounter with a deadly extraterrestrial. This time she returns to the very planet where her nightmare originally began to help search for some missing space colonists.

programme.title: The 700 Club
programme.desc: A magazine program featuring current events as seen from a Christian perspective, as well as testimonies of changed lives.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: When the Simpsons' plans for a family outing at the Frying Dutchman turn into a dining disaster, they try to salvage the night by telling different stories of disasters at sea. Lisa recounts the Mayflower voyage, and Bart tells tales of Tahitian mutiny.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: After Homer gets fired at the nuclear power plant, he takes over the ice cream truck business, while a depressed Marge creates popsicle stick sculptures to keep busy. The sculptures quickly become popular and Marge is excited to have a purpose in life.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: After a spring-cleaning frenzy and inhaling too many fumes, Marge suffers from retrograde amnesia. In an effort to bring back her memory, Homer takes her around town to re-familiarize her with her surroundings.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: After visiting an evolution exhibit, Flanders pushes Mayor Quimby to appoint Reverend Lovejoy as a "Morality Czar"' in charge of spreading the theory of creationism. Darwin's theories are outlawed and Lisa is the only supporter of the theory.

programme.desc: David Ford was a police officer in Kentucky. But when he's found dead in his home, police are left wondering who would kill one of their own. For weeks before the murder, David had been receiving threatening notes. Could the writer be the culprit.

programme.title: 48 Hours
programme.desc: For more than two decades, a woman struggled to understand why her sister and brother-in-law were murdered by an intruder. Today, she is trying to heal by meeting the shooter face-to-face to get those answers.

programme.title: Murder Among Friends
programme.desc: When a young man is found slain in a cemetery, there are whispers his death was some kind of ritual sacrifice. Still, detectives aren't prepared for the black magic, satanic rituals, and psychic visions at the heart of this truly twisted murder.

programme.title: Fatal Vows
programme.desc: Young, rich, and religious, John and Nikki Hillrich fall in love at college. It's a match made in heaven- but hell is not far off. When desire collides with faith, secret lives marked by sinful liaisons and menacing new friends shatter their perfect life.

programme.title: My Family's Deadly Secret

programme.title: Web of Lies
programme.desc: Lonely teen Jessica Sacco turns to the internet to find other so-called 'Juggalos' who share her interests in edgy music. There, she makes new friends and even finds a boyfriend. She moves in with them, and soon finds herself unable to escape their grip.

programme.title: Pandora's Box: Unleashing Evil

programme.desc: Tammy Lohr is a file clerk who is seduced by a decorated and very married cop. Things heat up when his wife receives an anonymous letter revealing the affair followed by a mysterious fire, a brutal stabbing and an elaborate plot to cover it up.

programme.title: Relatively Evil

programme.title: Twisted Sisters

programme.title: Crimes Gone Viral
programme.desc: A busy couple watches helplessly through a streaming security camera as a man burglarizes their home. A woman inexplicably fires a gun into a house and then returns to toss in a flaming torch.

programme.title: Web of Lies

programme.desc: A masked predator is harassing high school girls in New Hampshire and will not stop until they meet his demands. His victims don't know one another, but somehow their tormenter knows them all. Police race to unmask him before it's too late.

programme.title: People Magazine Investigates
programme.desc: A woman is murdered the same night she's supposed to go out with rising star, Ashton Kutcher. Police believe the clues point to a serial killer.

programme.title: People Magazine Investigates

programme.title: People Magazine Investigates
programme.desc: Gallaudet University is America's premier college for the deaf, but this haven for higher learning is turned upside down when two students are murdered in their dorm rooms. Investigators dive into campus life and reveal a serial killer in the making.

programme.title: Web of Lies
programme.desc: Retiree Alex Strategos moves to Florida to be closer to his son, but loneliness consumes him. He turns to internet dating and finds 69 year-old Melissa, but is soon struck by a rush of unexplained illnesses.

programme.title: Swamp Murders
programme.desc: When a night out ends in bloodshed for 23-year-old Navy veteran Raul Mendoza, Houston police have a lot of questions on their hands. But a tip from Raul's sister soon reveals that someone police have met before may hold the answers.

programme.title: Swamp Murders
programme.desc: 36-year-old Kimra Riley heads to a Sheffield, Alabama bar looking for fun and soon finds something far more sinister. Two months later, her body is found tangled up on the banks of the Tennessee River. Can police bring justice to this single mom's family.

programme.title: The Devil Speaks
programme.desc: Investigators must cast a wide net for clues when the family of Breckenridge resident Sharon Garrison report her missing. There's evidence to suggest she's skipped town, but a set of secret cassette tapes soon point to something far more sinister.

programme.title: Raw Terror
programme.desc: Christina Woods was reported missing by her mother Mary. Detectives uncover a complicated web involving Christina's husband Troy, her best friend Brooke and Brooke's husband Dan. Her body was found 600 miles away.

programme.title: The Perfect Murder
programme.desc: Daniel Ott is just one day from moving with his girlfriend when an intruder shoots him dead with a shotgun. A stunning coincidence will lead the investigation into the heart of one of the most dangerous criminal rings in the country..

programme.desc: A drive-by shooting leaves Van Terry dead; to crack the case, Lt. Joe Kenda must put his faith... in a burglar. Then...Cherie Bradley and her ex-boyfriend Anthony Carroll are found dead, and it's up to Kenda to discover which of their relatives did it.

programme.title: I Am Homicide

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines
programme.desc: Blaze and Crusher discover a medieval kingdom holding a royal race. The two trucks become knights to compete in the race across the realm.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines
programme.desc: When Crusher accidentally knocks a bottle of 'grow spice' onto a meatball, it grows to an enormous size and rolls away. It's up to Blaze and Pickle to transform into robots and stop the meatball before it wrecks the entire town.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines
programme.desc: When Crusher overloads Gabby's Truck Wash with too much soap, its pieces explode out into Axle City! Blaze and AJ must embark on a quest to track down the missing pieces and rebuild the Truck Wash, so his friends can get clean.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines
programme.desc: It's a snowy day in Axle City, and every truck in town is lining up for a delicious winter warm-up: hot chocolate. But when Crusher tries to take all the hot chocolate for himself, Blaze is in hot pursuit to get it back.

programme.title: Bubble Guppies
programme.desc: Oh no! Nonny broke his glasses! When they're fixed, Nonny is determined to retrieve them on his won. But to do it, he'll have to depend on his other four senses to reach the glasses store before it closes.

programme.title: Proof of Life
programme.desc: A woman hires a professional negotiator when guerrillas in South America kidnap her husband.

programme.title: Queen & Slim
programme.desc: Two people out on their first date go on the run after they are forced to kill a violent police officer who attacks them during a traffic stop.

programme.title: Bridget Jones: The Edge of Reason
programme.desc: Bridget's jealousy starts to cramp her new love life with Mark Darcy. Soon, she begins to question not only her relationship, but her social circle and entire lifestyle as well.

programme.title: Ruby Sparks
programme.desc: A novelist creates the perfect woman, Ruby, while working on his latest novel.

programme.title: Rush
programme.desc: The 1970s rivalry between Formula One racers James Hunt and Niki Lauda.

programme.title: House
programme.desc: Two couples wind up at an old inn off the beaten path and have to stay the night due to the weather. A man threatens them with death unless they produce one dead body before sunrise.

programme.title: Poltergeist II: The Other Side
programme.desc: The Freeling family settles into a new home after restless spirits destroyed their former residence. Unfortunately, these malevolent ghosts follow the family in an effort to claim their clairvoyant daughter.

programme.title: Six Days, Seven Nights
programme.desc: After their plane crashes, a man and woman are stranded on an island in the South Pacific.

programme.title: Tully
programme.desc: A mother with a newborn infant and two other children is exhausted and at the end of her rope, so when her brother offers to pay for a night nanny she takes him up on the offer. The two women soon form a strong bond over life, love and motherhood.

programme.title: Living in Oblivion
programme.desc: A man tries to shoot a movie despite the fact that everything that can go wrong, does.

programme.title: Her Smell
programme.desc: The lead singer of a formerly-popular punk band struggles with sobriety and mental health.

programme.title: Showtime
programme.desc: A no-nonsense detective and a bumbling patrolman team up to star in a police reality show.

programme.title: Black Rain
programme.desc: Two New York officers get involved in a gang war between members of the Japanese Mafia.

programme.title: The Quarry
programme.desc: A police chief becomes suspicious when a drifter appears to be posing as the preacher of a small town church.

programme.title: Valkyrie
programme.desc: A plot to assassinate Hitler begins when German officers and politicians see the downfall of Germany coming. All is arranged, but things start to go wrong and turn the plan into a tragedy.

programme.title: Talk to Me
programme.desc: The story of radio DJ Ralph Green, an ex-con who became an activist in the 1960s.

programme.title: Becoming Jane
programme.desc: The story of pre-fame Jane Austen and her desire to give up money and social status to marry for love. She meets a young Irish rogue, falls head over heels in love, and risks losing everything that matters to her and her family.

programme.title: Miss Pettigrew Lives for a Day
programme.desc: A governess begins a job as a social secretary for a high-profile American singer.

programme.title: Disaster Movie
programme.desc: A group of survivors try to save the planet from natural disasters and catastrophic events.

programme.title: Something Wild
programme.desc: A businessman's life is turned upside down by a joy-ride with a freethinking wild woman.

programme.title: Beginners
programme.desc: A young man is shocked when his father makes two huge announcements: that he has a younger male lover and he's terminally ill with cancer.

programme.title: The Campaign
programme.desc: Two CEOs convince a hapless local tourism director to run for congress against a disgraced incumbent in order to gain influence and power over a North Carolina district.

programme.title: American Son
programme.desc: A broken couple is reunited in a Florida police station in hopes of recovering their missing teenage son.

programme.title: Sound of My Voice
programme.desc: A journalist investigates a cult leader that claims he is from the future.

programme.title: Hours
programme.desc: A man's wife dies in childbirth in a hospital in New Orleans just as Hurricane Katrina hits. With his newborn daughter on a ventilator, the man must wait the storm out and hope to survive.

programme.title: The Great Gilly Hopkins
programme.desc: A young foster child orchestrates a plan to escape her current home in search of her mother.

programme.title: Lady in the Water
programme.desc: A man discovers a lady in the pool of his building who happens to be from Blue World.

programme.title: Walk the Line
programme.desc: The life of country music star Johnny Cash. After serving in the air force in Germany, Cash buys a guitar and begins touring. He develops a drug habit, but after getting divorced, he is eased off his addiction by June Carter, whom he eventually marries.

programme.title: A Walk Among the Tombstones
programme.desc: An unlicensed private detective reluctantly takes the case of a drug trafficker whose wife was kidnapped and brutally murdered. Learning that the men responsible have committed similar heinous acts before, he races to catch them before they strike again.

programme.title: The Rite
programme.desc: Inspired by the true events of a skeptical American seminary student, who travelled to Italy to take an exorcism course.

programme.desc: For two days in Los Angeles, a racially and economically diverse group of people interact with one another in unexpected ways after a car accident, with interesting and unsettling consequences.

programme.desc: A teenager learns to live his life and find his voice through the music of Bruce Springsteen.

programme.desc: An American soldier goes AWOL to compete in an outlawed martial arts competition.

programme.title: Street Signs Asia
programme.desc: With Asia's markets in full swing, Street Signs follows the day's biggest moves.

programme.title: Street Signs
programme.desc: A one hour view into Europe's equity session, providing price discovery, the street's view, instant analysis and a link to the business stories trending online and on social, breaking down key economic data in Europe.

programme.title: Worldwide Exchange
programme.desc: This worldwide, daily business program is anchored from New York, London and Singapore.

programme.title: American Greed: Scams, Scoundrels and Scandals
programme.desc: Miami's Claudio Osorio casts himself as a wealthy international business tycoon. He steals more than $40 million from investors and the US government through a sham computer company and bogus plots to building homes for the poor.

programme.title: Cleveland Hustles
programme.desc: Marketing guru Kumar Aurora must decide between an artisan pickle maker and craft beverage company to get his backing in economically challenged Gordon Square, Cleveland.

programme.title: West Texas Investors Club
programme.desc: A shoreline fisherman pitches his supercharged bait launcher in a last-ditch effort to get his troubled business off the ground. Later, a retired teacher introduces the guys to the world of 'escape rooms' and must prove herself with an impromptu mock-up.

programme.title: Marketing.Media.Money
programme.desc: In just seven years, Dubai-based Huda Beauty has turned into a $1.2 billion company. CNBC's James Wright finds out how Huda Kattan and her two sisters did it all without the use of traditional advertising.

programme.title: Lasting Legacy
programme.desc: The Chu siblings are continuing the legacy of their late father, who founded the Mission Hills empire in 1992. As the eldest son, Chairman & CEO Kenneth Chu swung into the forefront of the family business.

programme.title: Managing Asia
programme.desc: Glenn Fogel, the CEO of Booking Holdings, talks to Christine Tan about how the world's largest online travel company is dealing COVID-19 cancellations, its latest round of painful layoffs, and why the 'splinternet' is hurting the travel industry.

programme.title: The Edge
programme.desc: CNBC's Tania Bryer explores the latest innovations within the beauty industry, from hyper-personalization to state-of-the-art treatments and ground-breaking technology.

programme.title: Blue Collar Millionaires
programme.desc: A grade school dropout who built a multi-million dollar flooring business; a die-hard dredger who makes a fortune moving earth underwater; and a demolition diva whose love of pink has her painting the town red.

programme.title: Trailblazers
programme.desc: Bollywood superstar Shah Rukh Kahn turns tour guide in his home town of New Delhi. In a very personal journey, driving a Jeep similar to the one he had before he was famous, he shows Tania Bryer his former school and the house he grew up in.
